Verses: 1 aadhalaal Kiristhuvukkul Yaadhoru Aarudhalum, Anbinaale Yaadhoru Therudhalum, Aaviyin Yaadhoru Aikkiyamum, Yaadhoru Urukkamaana Patchamum Irakkangalum Undaanaal,
2 neengal Ega Sindhaiyum Ega Anbumullavargalaayirundhu, Isaindha Aaththumaakkalaai Ondraiye Sindhiththu, En Sandhoshaththai Niraivaakkungal.
3 ondraiyum Vaadhinaalaavadhu Veenperumaiyinaalaavadhu Seyyaamal, Manaththaazhmaiyinaale Oruvaraiyoruvar Thangalilum Menmaiyaanavargalaaga Ennakkadaveergal.
4 avanavan Thanakkaanavaigalaiyalla, Pirarukkaanavaigalaiyum Nokkuvaanaaga.
5 kiristhu Yesuvilirundha Sindhaiye Ungalilum Irukkakkadavadhu;
6 avar Dhevanudaiya Roobamaayirundhum, Dhevanukku Samamaayiruppadhaik Kollaiyaadina Porulaaga Ennaamal,
7 thammaiththaame Verumaiyaakki, Adimaiyin Roobameduththu, Manushar Saayalaanaar.
8 avar Manusharoobamaaik Kaanappattu, Maranabariyandham, Adhaavadhu Siluvaiyin Maranabariyandhamum Keezhppadindhavaraagi, Thammaiththaame Thaazhththinaar.
9 aadhalaal Dhevan Ellaavatrirkum Melaaga Avarai Uyarththi,
10 yesuvin Naamaththil Vaanor Boodhalaththor Boomiyin Keezhaanorudaiya Muzhangaal Yaavum Mudangumpadikkum,
11 pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Magimaiyaaga Yesukiristhu Karththarendru Naavugal Yaavum Arikkaipannumpadikkum, Ellaa Naamaththirkum Melaana Naamaththai Avarukkuth Thandharulinaar.

12 aadhalaal, Enakkup Piriyamaanavargale, Neengal Eppozhudhum Keezhppadigirapadiye, Naan Ungalukku Sameebamaayirukkumpozhudhu Maaththiramalla, Naan Dhooramaayirukkira Ippozhudhum, Adhiga Bayaththodum Nadukkaththodum Ungal Ratchippu Niraiverap Pirayaasappadungal.
13 enenil Dhevane Thammudaiya Dhayavulla Siththaththinpadi Viruppaththaiyum Seygaiyaiyum Ungalil Undaakkugiravaraayirukkiraar.

14 naan Veenaaga Odinadhum Veenaagap Pirayaasappattadhumillaiyengira Magizhchchi Kiristhuvin Naalil Enakku Undaayiruppadharku, Jeevavasanaththaip Pidiththukkondu, Ulagaththile Sudargalaippolap Piragaasikkira Neengal,
15 konalum Maarubaadumaana Sandhadhiyin Naduvile Kutramatravargalum Kabadatravargalum, Dhevanudaiya Maasatrapillaigalumaayirukkumpadikku,
16 ellaavatraiyum Murumuruppillaamalum Tharkkippillaamalum Seyyungal.
17 melum, Ungal Visuvaasamaagiya Baliyinmelum Oozhiyaththinmelum Naan Vaarkkappattupponaalum, Naan Magizhndhu, Ungalanaivarodunkooda Sandhoshappaduven.
18 idhinimiththam Neengalum Magizhndhu, Ennodekooda Sandhoshappadungal.
19 andriyum, Naanum Ungal Seydhigalai Arindhu Manaththerudhal Adaiyumpadi Seekkiramaaith Theemoththeyuvai Ungalidaththil Anuppalaamendru Karththaraagiya Yesuvukkul Nambiyirukkiren.
20 adhenendraal, Ungal Kaariyangalai Unmaiyaai Visaarikkiradharku Ennaippola Manadhullavan Avanaiyandri Veroruvanum Ennidaththilillai.
21 matravargalellaarum Kiristhu Yesuvukkuriyavaigalaith Thedaamal, Thangalukkuriyavaigalaiye Thedugiraargal.
22 thagappanukkup Pillai Oozhiyanjseyvadhupola, Avan Ennudanekooda Suviseshaththinimiththam Oozhiyanseydhaanendru Avanudaiya Uththamagunaththai Arindhirukkireergal.
23 aagaiyaal En Kaariyangal Innapadi Nadakkum Endru Naan Arindhavudane Avanai Anuppalaamendru Ninaiththirukkiren.
24 andriyum Naane Seekkiraththil Varuvenendru Karththarukkul Nambikkaiyaayirukkiren.
25 melum, En Sagodharanum, Udanvelaiyaalum, Udansevaganum, Ungal Sthaanaabadhiyum, En Kuraichchalukku Udhaviseydhavanumaana Eppaappirotheeththuvai Ungalidaththil Anuppavendumendru Enninen.
26 avan Ungal Ellaar Melum Vaanjaiyullavanum, Thaan Viyaadhippattadhai Neengal Kelvippattadhinaale, Migavum Viyaakulappadugiravanumaayirundhaan.

27 avan Viyaadhippattu Maranaththirkuch Chameepamaayirundhadhu Meydhaan. Aagilum, Dhevan Avanukku Iranginaar; Avanukku Iranginadhumallaamal, Dhukkaththinmel Dhukkam Enakku Undaagaadhapadikku, Enakkum Iranginaar.
28 aagaiyaal Neengal Avanai Marupadiyum Kandu Sandhoshappadavum, En Dhukkang Kuraiyavum, Avanai Adhiseekkiramaai Anuppinen.
29 aanapadiyinaale Neengal Karththarukkul Migundha Sandhoshaththode Avanai Etrukkondu, Ippadippattavargalaik Ganamaai Ennungal.
30 enenil Neengal Enakku Seyyavendiya Oozhiyaththile Ungal Kuraivai Niraivaakkumpadikku, Avan Than Piraananaiyum Ennaamal, Kiristhuvin Oozhiyaththinimiththam Maranaththirku Sameebamaayirundhaan.
